name: Biomechanicals (HR Giger)
description:
Trained on 100 images in biomechanical style. Mostly paintings and illustrations, a few photos of props and some renderings.

Try this prompt as a start:

"<lora:Biomechanicals_v2:0.7> style, hnsrdlf style, SUBJECT DESCRIPTION, intricate biomechanical detail"

I tried various models with this and got good results with: Analog Madness, Art & Eros, DreamShaper, ChilloutMix, Hassanblend1512, movieDiffusion, Elldreth's StolenDreams Mix, theAllysMix, LOFI, Timeless Diffusion and the original SD1.5 it is based on.

Note: some of the example images' prompts are from the img2img upscale, not the initial txt2img generation.

modelVersions.name: v2
modelVersions.description: Trained mostly on illustrations. Has the tendency to not produce real black, sometimes light leaks in from the corners, giving it an analog, scanned look.

meta.prompt: a dangerous looking sprinkled girl piss on top of a table with a alien head, in the style of giger in the hole, with many blood around, hyperrealism, hyper realistic color photo, realistic photography <lora:biomechanicals_v2:2> ((hnsrdlf style))
meta.negativePrompt: out of frame, lowres, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, duplicate, out of frame, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck, username, watermark, signature,

meta.prompt: <lora:Biomechanical_v2_lora1500:1.0>, hyper realistic, crisp, hnsrdlf style, intricate (biomechanical:0.8) detail, <lora:ContrastFix_sd15[to8contrast style]:0.5>, photorealism

<lora:Biomechanicals_v2_lora1500:0.7> style, hnsrdlf style, (vintage photo:1.1) of intricate biomechanical fishes scattered around the beach, (shiny wet dark surface:0.8), warzone, vast dark ocean (with waves:0.7), (reflections:0.5) on small puddles and wet sand, (dramatic:1.2) overcast sky, (high contrast:1.4), photo realism, award-winning photo, analog style, underexposed, vintage
meta.negativePrompt: drawing, painting, digital art, boring, bad composition, low resolution, hdr, color
